snippet.title: Onegai My Melody - My Melody Adventure - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Release Thread: https://www.smwcentral.net/?p=viewthread&t=126848
Music Used
Quiet/Silence - Cave Story Remeastered
Happy Fun Candy Time - Angry Video Game Adventures

After one year making this hack, THIS, is FINALLY DONE!
Meant to be released on January 18 but delayed due to technical reasons, this is the longest hack I have done in my years of SMW Hacking. This is 92 exits long and has barely anything to do with Sanrio.
Melody sets off on an adventure after reading a book about this world, finding it interesting and with nothing better to do, she sets foot into this land.
This is a Normal/Hard hack, 10 levels each world, with tons of custom music and graphics, good luck to whoever tries this, and thank you for the patience with this thing
